exporter

Class JDBCExporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • exporter.BaseExporter
      • exporter.JDBCExporter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    H2Exporter, SqliteExporter

    public class JDBCExporter
extends BaseExporter
    The Class JDBCExporter extends BaseExporter adding the capacity of exporting to a JDBC database.

      • placeholders

        private java.lang.String placeholders(int n)
        Create a placeholder of n "?" to use with PreparedStatement. For example placeholders(3) = "?, ?, ?"
        Parameters:
        n - the numer of question marks
        Returns:
        the output string

      • itemgetter

        private <T> java.util.ArrayList<T> itemgetter(java.util.List<T> from,
                                    java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> indices)
        Itemgetter is similar to the python function without the C speed. It takes a list and a list of indices and returns a list of items from the from list at the requested indices.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the generic type of the input list
        Parameters:
        from - the input list
        indices - the indices to get
        Returns:
        the output list
